info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 7:56PM CDT until June 2 at 3:11AM CDT by NWS Topeka KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Topeka KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...
Cottonwood River near Emporia affecting Lyon County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cottonwood River near Emporia.
* WHEN...From Friday morning to early Monday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South bank of the Cottonwood River 1 mile south of Emporia floods. At 23.0 feet, North bank of the Cottonwood River begins to flood. Lowland flooding occurs along the Cottonwood River from Plymouth to Neosho Rapids.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 21.9 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING
